sourcePaths.description: A list of paths that contain source markdown files

templatePaths.description: A list of paths that contain template markdown files

componentPaths.description: A list of paths that contain pandoc metadata files

generatorPaths.description: A list of paths that contain JSON generator source data

outDirectory.description: Directory to where PDF files will be rendered out. (If left blank, PDFs will be saved in same directory as source file)
